author: rajdavies
msg: Use in mmeory list in FilePendingMessageCursor - until memory limit reached - then use disk.
USe FilePendingMessageCursor in TopicSubscription instead of LinkedList

author: jmarino
msg: change TargetInvoker.invokeTarget() to support conversation sequences, e.g. start, continue, end, none; change Store to take String-based ids instead of UUID so it is compatible with the Java C&I spec; refactor ScopeContainer based on these changes to support conversational invocations; Add conversation metadata to ServiceContract and Operation; add support to introspect conversation metadata from Java annotations

author: psteitz
msg: Replaced hand-crafted ant build with maven-generated build.xml.
